contextId.occurrenceNote: The abstract noun "destruction" can be translated using the verb "destroy." You may need to make explicit what it is the Almighty will destroy. Alternate translation: "On that day the Almighty will destroy his enemies" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
contextId.glQuote: With it will come destruction from the Almighty

contextId.occurrenceNote: The abstract noun "faithfulness" can be stated as "faithful" or "faithfully." Alternate translation: "always faithful to his covenant" or "always loves faithfully" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])

There is no known place with this name. The abstract noun "judgment" can be translated using the verb "judge." Alternate translation: "Valley Where Yahweh Judges" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])
